message:
Dear {{ doc.first_name }} {{ doc.last_name }},

Your broker agreement has been successfully created in the Kisan Warehouse system. Below are the details for your reference:

Broker Information:

  • Broker Type: {{ doc.broker_type }}
  • Status: {{ doc.broker_status }}

Contact Information:

  • Mobile: {{ doc.mobile }}
  • Email: {{ doc.email }}

Address:

  • {{ doc.address }}, {{ doc.city }}, {{ doc.state }} - {{ doc.zip }}

Commission Rate:

{{ doc.commission_rate }}%

Terms & Conditions:

  1. The broker must comply with all applicable laws and regulations while operating under this agreement.
  2. Commission rates are subject to change based on mutual consent and system updates.
  3. All disputes will be subject to jurisdiction of the registered office of Kisan Warehouse.
  4. The broker is responsible for maintaining accurate and updated contact information.
  5. This agreement is non-transferable and valid until terminated by either party with prior notice.

Thank you,
Kisan Warehouse Team
name: Broker Agreement Email
subject: Broker Agreement Notification from Kisan Warehouse

message:
{% set customer_doc = frappe.get_doc("Customer", doc.customer) %} {% set product_doc = frappe.get_doc("Product", doc.product) %}

Hello {{ customer_doc.first_name }} {{ customer_doc.last_name }},

Here are the Sauda Booking Details:

  • Booking Date: {{ doc.booking_date }}
  • Customer Name: {{ customer_doc.first_name }} {{ customer_doc.last_name }}
  • Product: {{ product_doc.product_name }}
  • Expected Quantity (kg): {{ doc.expected_quantity }}
  • Rate (per Quintal): {{ doc.sauda_rate }}
  • Total Amount: {{ doc.total_amount }}
  • Duration & Timeline:
    • Delivery End Date: {{ doc.delivery_end_date }}
    • Payment End Date: {{ doc.payment_end_date }}

Thanks,
KisanMitra Warehouse
name: Sauda Saved
subject: Sauda Saved Notification Email
